reviews: I am using apple products from a long time but this time it became very frustrating. Purchased a series 7 watch, was sent by Appario Retail, Gurgaon. Got the watch and I found battery is taking about 4 hours to charge from 10-100% and was draning very fast. it was not even giving me 9-10 hrs of backup even when I was Turing off all time on display, ECG, Heart rate and all other battery draining sensors. I called Amazon Customer support, they said, Sir you'll have to contact apple support team, we are not responsible of apple products. apple support team told me that as its a new product, I'll need to go to service centre, they will give me a letter stating its a damaged product and amazon will replace it. I again called amazon customer support and asked them if replacement is possible from amazon. they confirm the same. now apple service centre is about 200kms from my town, still I visited them and they had no idea what I was asking for. After a couple of calls to apple, they gave me a letter stating of faulty product. Submitted that to amazon. I asked them for refund but they refuced and after many calls and mails finally they agreed for replacement got a replaced watch after 15-20 days. now New watch was also having same problem, which is totally not acceptable from company like apple. Now again I called amazon and they said same thing again that I'll need to go to apple support and they can only help me. again same procedure, I travelled 200kms to apple service centre again they gave me the same letter. but this time when I called amazon to submit that letter, they said sir, you'll have to get another letter, which will be denial letter from amazon in which they should write Amazon will replace or refund it. Now this is very frustrating to me as service centre is very far from my place and I can't travel so much again and again.

reviews: I waited and bought this watch for it's fast charging capability. It is charging 21% in 1 hour using Apple's 20w charger and the cable that comes in the box. Only after checking in some tech websites and youtube videos I came to know that Apple watch series 7 doesn't support fast charging in India. Get this from outside India if you are planning to buy. This is completely disappointing from Apple.

 Replaced my Series 4 with the Series 7 and although the differences aren’t monumental, it is the best smart watch to track your workouts, sleep track. It's upto you to use best out of it.The screen 45mm does make a big difference in using text and reading notificationsI purchased 45mm GPS + Cellular bcoz I didn't want to carry my phone when going out for a run.Make sure to enquire about your cellular connectivity to watch. I have Vi carrier and needed post paid connection to create eSIM for cellular connectivity in series 7.It's a great watch series if you use it religiously
